hero.title: Transform Your Customer
hero.subtitle: Automate customer support with intelligent AI chatbots. Manage conversations across WhatsApp, Instagram, and web chat from one unified inbox.
hero.chatMsg1: Hi! I'd like to book a table for 4 people tonight at 7pm.
hero.chatMsg2: Perfect! I can help you with that. Let me check availability for tonight at 7pm for 4 guests.
hero.chatMsg3: Great news! We have availability. Would you prefer indoor or outdoor seating?

features.title: Everything you need to automate customer communication
features.subtitle: Our AI-powered platform handles customer inquiries 24/7, freeing your team to focus on what matters most.

ai.title: AI-Powered Responses
ai.description: GPT-powered AI understands context and provides accurate, human-like responses to customer queries instantly.

omnichannel.title: Omnichannel Inbox
omnichannel.description: Manage WhatsApp, Instagram, and website chat from a single unified inbox. Never miss a message again.

handoff.title: Smart Human Handoff
handoff.description: AI detects when human assistance is needed and seamlessly transfers conversations to your team.

analytics.title: Real-time Analytics
analytics.description: Track conversation metrics, response times, and customer satisfaction with detailed insights.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Communicate with customers in their preferred language with automatic translation support.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: Your data is protected with end-to-end encryption and compliance with industry standards.

solutions.title: Built for your industry
solutions.subtitle: Specialized solutions designed for restaurants and real estate businesses.

restaurant.subtitle: Handle reservations, menu inquiries, and customer support automatically.

testimonials.title: Loved by businesses worldwide
testimonials.subtitle: See how businesses are transforming their customer communication with Kribaat.

review1.text: Kribaat has reduced our customer response time from hours to seconds. Our guests love the instant responses and our staff can focus on providing great service.
review1.name: James Chen

review2.text: The AI handles 90% of property inquiries automatically. We've doubled our lead conversion rate since implementing Kribaat.
review2.name: Sarah Liu

review3.text: Setting up was incredibly easy. Within a day, we had AI handling reservations and menu questions. Game changer for our small team!
review3.name: Michael Wong
